jrmds.main

Interface RuleRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Component,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Component,java.lang.Long>

    @Repository
public interface RuleRepository
extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Component,java.lang.Long>
    Repository for components. Provides various functions.
